Addon.name: More Caves and Cliffs
Addon.role: This Add-on adds more things that have not yet been implemented from Minecraft caves and cliffs in the Bedrock version, it also adds concepts of the features that have not yet been revealed

Addon.name: Caves and Cliffs Addon
Addon.role: This addon attempts to add all the features in the caves and cliffs addon, as well as some unique ideas made by myself, for example glowing wool and glass (from glowing ink).

Addon.name: Caves & Cliffs Concepts
Addon.role: I really loved Minecraft Live 2020 earlier on in October, it was a great time! Especially with the announcement of the Caves and Cliffs update. It is already seeming to be a great update! Sadly though, it won't be here for a while. Well this addon will add some features from that, such as the archaeology system, as a concept! Hope you enjoy it!

Addon.name: Monsters Of Horror (A Horror Addon) (B)
Addon.role: This addon is a horror addon about dangerous creatures that haunt your minecraft world and can be the most dangerous things you will ever face. They could be up to 40 feet or up to 9 feet. But no matter size they are incredibly strong.

Addon.name: Monsters Of Horror (A Horror Addon)(R)
Addon.role: This addon is a horror addon about dangerous creatures that haunt your minecraft world and can be the most dangerous things you will ever face. They could be up to 40 feet or up to 9 feet. But no matter size they are incredibly strong.

Addon.name: The Black Horror Addon
Addon.role: It was a peaceful day in the regular world, when the darkness from down below attacked. It spread all the way to the overworld, turning beautiful, lush biomes into black, void plains. With the darkness came dark, horrifying beasts that attack anything that moves. Their only weakness: daylight. Buuuuuut they evolved past that.

Addon.name: Magical Apples V1
Addon.role: Are you a fan of Harry Potter or do you like magic? This addon is different than my other addons because its a food and it is useful, because you can eat it and it will make your health full in just 1 secs and each apples has its own effects and all the apples has duration which is 5 minutes.

Addon.name: GRX Tweaks v1.1.9 (UI Overlay Hider + Addon Update!)
Addon.role: GRX Tweaks for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition for More Features! What is GRX Tweaks? GRX Tweaks is a Minecraft optimization resource pack. It allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for better textures and many configuration options.

Addon.name: Night Vision Goggles Addon
Addon.role: Are you tired of deinking night vision potions the whole time? Then this addon is perfect for you because it adds night vision goggles that you can put on your head and you never have to drink potions every 5 minutes and its also multiplayer compatible.

Addon.name: Merging Items 1.1.7 [Goodlands Update]
Addon.role: In this addon, you can merge items and make better ones! They are extremely useful as well! If you like the idea of this addon, then read all about it! (Also: Suggest some more items in the comments!)

Addon.name: Sapphire Expansion (Beta v9.1.7)
Addon.role: Im sure you Never wanted more hostile mobs in the game, but what if I told you there are very powerful items and tools in this addon that can aid you in the game and with fighting off the hostile mobs in this addon.Im sure you Never wanted more hostile mobs in the game, but what if I told you there are very powerful items and tools in this addon that can aid you in the game and with fighting off the hostile mobs in this addon.

Addon.name: Mythical World
Addon.role: Hello everyone, this is my first addon so I hope you like it, this addon is in beta so it is likely to have bugs, anything talk to me on my discord, soon I will do something better, the addon may not have a good quality for be done on the cell phone,

Addon.name: Magic Pearls (R)
Addon.role: he Night Vision Torch Addon adds a new function for torches in Minecraft. It basically turns the torch into a light source and it works just by holding it in your hand.
Addon.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/14/magic pearls resources pack.mcaddon

Addon.name: Magic Pearls (B)
Addon.role: he Night Vision Torch Addon adds a new function for torches in Minecraft. It basically turns the torch into a light source and it works just by holding it in your hand.
Addon.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/14/magic pearls behavior pack.mcaddon

Addon.name: Warped Origins Addon
Addon.role: The Origins Addon lets you choose between 9 origins (including human) to start the game off with.

Addon.name: The Predator Addon (V2)
Addon.role: This addon will add a new mobs and items of the Predator! You can get things like The predators claws to his invisibility Cloaking device. This addon will have frequent updates.

Addon.name: Night Vision Glasses Addon
Addon.role: Building and fighting, or just survival in general for that matter, can be extremely difficult and dangerous during the night. Even turning the brightness to max doesn't always help. This add-on will help you with that as it adds Night Vision Glasses (or goggles) to the game which you can use to see with no trouble during the night.

Addon.name: JourneyCraft Accessories Update
Addon.role: Bored with vanilla MC? Then this add-on is perfect for you. This addon adds 30+ weapons, 10+ bosses, 25+ materials to be used into your Minecraft! This add-on was inspired by Terraria which explains why there is some Terraria stuff in this addon.
Addon.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/27/JourneyCraft Accessories Update MASTERMODE_1592980995048.mcaddon

Addon.name: Night Vision Goggles Addon (21 Language Options!) (16x16, 32x32)
Addon.role: I've always wanted an addon that added night vision goggles but I couldn't find one that fit me. So I decided to make it myself via an app called addon maker. Because of this,the addon is quite primitive: You'll be disappointed if you are expecting ground breaking mechanics.

Addon.name: Upgradeable Super Swords with Powers (Updated)
Addon.role: I bring you a new complement with which you can improve your wooden, stone, gold, iron  diamond swords and netherite swords  as well as make a battle ax with powers (including swords).

Addon.name: Upgradeable Super Swords with Powers (Updated)
Addon.role: I bring you a new complement with which you can improve your wooden, stone, gold, iron  diamond swords and netherite swords  as well as make a battle ax with powers (including swords).

Addon.name: Origins+ 1.5.0
Addon.role: Origins+, Created by me (ShadowSharkPVP), Had help from -Folk with the Origin descriptions.

Addon.name: Mechs and Jetpacks - Snow Vac Edition
Addon.role: Load up on all your Mech and Jetpack needs right here. We have flying mechs, flying transports, three types of mining mechs, defensive (or attacking) mechs, two types of jetpacks.

Addon.name: Potion Blocks Add-on (1.16)
Addon.role: Ever heard of blocks that do extra-special things? This add-on adds blocks that give you potion effects when you step on them.

Addon.name: Item Effector Addon
Addon.role: Honestly i am very scared of my survival world to die, so because of that... I made this addon, called Item Effector!Im very excited too showcase and give you a help with my creation, so Let's Go!

Addon.name: Magical Broomstick Addon! [v2.5 Updated]
Addon.role: Let's fly into the sky, ride on a magic broom. Magic will protect you. So you can fly safely ..... probably. Beautiful ocean . . vast mountains ... hellish world and end world ... A broom will meet you in a wonderful encounter.

Addon.name: De-Gore-ations! (Horror)
Addon.role: This addon adds 15 new horror themed decorations to the game. Originally created for personal use, I'm now releasing this for creators of adventure, horror, roleplay, and halloween/holiday map creators, as well as those who just want to add some ghoulish fun to their games

Addon.name: Minecraft Caves and Cliffs Addon (Lush Caves Update)
Addon.role: Can you not wait for the Caves and Cliffs update to be released? Would you like to play with some of the new features that haven't even been added in betas yet now? Well, this addon is for you. It adds some concepts of new features like amethyst, glow berries and more. I hope you enjoy this new addon.

Map.name: Caves and Cliffs Showcase Map
Map.role: arn all features about the new Caves and Cliffs update with this map. You can learn about the new Glow Item Frame, the new Glow Squid, the new Glow Ink Sac, and more!

Map.name: The Nightmare (Short Horror) (Adventure)
Map.role: You just came from a long day at school and when on the walk to home you saw a stranger that looked suspicious, you went to your bed and when that stranger got into your mind; you began to sleep and the nightmare about that stranger began. Can you get through the nightmare in time or will you have that nightmare for ever?

Map.name: Dungeon: Triple Towers
Map.role: Dungeons: Triple Towers is a dungeon style role-playing map with puzzles, traps, trickery, monster fights, boss fights, and more! This is the first of this (potential) series of my Dungeons maps, and my first completed map (and map posted here).

Map.name: Home (Horror) [Adventure]
Map.role: Hello! This is my very first map (horror) so if there are problems please comment me. This map is about your dad got trapped in the basement. There is a evil spirit haunting your family. Its up to you to save your dad. The ending is a bit bad but im still learning to make it better.

Map.name: Eyes The Horror Game [Minigame]
Map.role: Eyes - The Horror Game is a first person horror game where the player has to enter a building during the night, steal twenty bags of money and escape the crime scene trying to pass by unseen. The problem is that instead of conventional security, you run into something a lot worse... ghosts.

Map.name: Eyes The Horror Game [Minigame]
Map.role: Eyes - The Horror Game is a first person horror game where the player has to enter a building during the night, steal twenty bags of money and escape the crime scene trying to pass by unseen. The problem is that instead of conventional security, you run into something a lot worse... ghosts.

Map.name: One Night At Frankie's 3 (Horror!) [Minigame]
Map.role: This is the threequel  (also known as the second sequel) in the One Night At Frankie's horror map series. And for you who don't know, it is greatly inspired by Five Nights At Freddie's which is a popular horror game for the PC. You will play as the Steve who works at Frankie's as a night guard. But this isn't an ordinary place. During the night the animatronics come to life and it's your job to stop them.

Map.name: One Night At Frankie's 3 (Horror!) [Minigame]
Map.role: This is the threequel  (also known as the second sequel) in the One Night At Frankie's horror map series. And for you who don't know, it is greatly inspired by Five Nights At Freddie's which is a popular horror game for the PC. You will play as the Steve who works at Frankie's as a night guard. But this isn't an ordinary place. During the night the animatronics come to life and it's your job to stop them.

Map.name: Kagerou (Japanese Horror) [Adventure]
Map.role: Kagerou is a Japanese horror experience for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. All Japanese texts have been translated to English, so it's perfectly playable for anyone who likes horror maps. This is definitely one of the most scary maps you'll experience as it includes several unpredictable jumpscares and overall just a creepy environment with custom sounds and new mobs.

Map.name: MurderEscape (Multiplayer Horror!) [Minigame]
Map.role: MurderEscape is an intense and scary multiplayer horror minigame. One of the players will be chosen as the murderer and the rest ones are runners who have to run through a forest and hopefully escape before it's too late. If you like horror maps then you are likely going to enjoy this little game too!

Map.name: One Night At Frankie's 3 (Horror!) [Minigame]
Map.role: This is the threequel  (also known as the second sequel) in the One Night At Frankie's horror map series. And for you who don't know, it is greatly inspired by Five Nights At Freddie's which is a popular horror game for the PC. You will play as the Steve who works at Frankie's as a night guard. But this isn't an ordinary place. During the night the animatronics come to life and it's your job to stop them.

Map.name: One Night At Frankie's - The Revenge (Horror!) [Minigame]
Map.role: This map is inspired by Five Nights At Freddy's but in this map you will be in a factory trying to survive through night. But is not going to be easy because there are alive hostile animatronics roaming the factory. It's considered a survival map with some horror elements. At this point there doesn't seem to be much other functionalities in terms of the items and so on.

Map.name: Eyes The Horror Game [Minigame]
Map.role: Eyes - The Horror Game is a first person horror game where the player has to enter a building during the night, steal twenty bags of money and escape the crime scene trying to pass by unseen. The problem is that instead of conventional security, you run into something a lot worse... ghosts

Map.name: Slendrina: The Cellar - Level #3 (Horror) [Adventure]
Map.role: The Cellar #3 is the third map in the Slendrina horror map series which is based on the Slendrina mobile game. You have been mysteriously trapped inside the abandoned prison and you must find a way out of there. Be on the lookout for the books as you need to collect 8 of them, keys are found hanging on the wall to open locked doors. Be cautious as Slendrina can show up anywhere to scare you to death!

Map.name: The Haunted Tunnel [Adventure]
Map.role: The Haunted Tunnel is a horror map where you've been trapped in a mineshaft and have to find your way out. It's a really well made map which includes horror, adventure and puzzle - all in one map. There are jumpscares, custom effects and a lot of clever things all throughout the experience. You'll most likely not want to go mining for a while after playing it!

Map.name: Bendy Game Horror (Previous Story 2) [Adventure]
Map.role: Bendy Game is a horror adventure and puzzle map series. This time you got a letter from a friend who wanted you to come back and visit the old shop.

Map.name: Bendy Game Horror (Previous Story 2) [Adventure]
Map.role: Bendy Game is a horror adventure and puzzle map series. This time you got a letter from a friend who wanted you to come back and visit the old shop.

Map.name: The House (Horror) [Adventure] [Minigame] (Beta)
Map.role: This map was inspired by the Slendrina: The Cellar map but instead of collecting books you will be collecting bags of gold.

Map.name: Poppy Playtime The Horror Map
Map.role: This map is based from the horror puzzle Game: Poppy Playtime.

Texture.name: Caves and Cliffs Addon (v2)
Texture.role: Did you watch Minecraft Live and want to try out the new features yourself without beta or snapshots? This addon tries to recreate every feature shown at Minecraft Live. I have also been showcasing these things on my YouTube channel called MrCrompz so if you like this addon consider checking that out.

Texture.name: John's X-ray (1.16+ Bedrock) Updated with Night Vision
Texture.role: The 'Xray for 1.16 Bedrock' is made for 1.16+ and  helps you find ores with ease and a lot faster, Can't find any diamonds or any type of ore with the 'X-ray for 1.16+' texture pack you will be able to find most ores faster and quicker.

Texture.name: Cave Enhancements Rewritten!
Texture.role: This add-on completely changes the underground! Introducing NEW cave biomes, mobs, and uses expanding upon the 1.17 and 1.18 updates alike.
Texture.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/3/Cave Enhancements Rewritten BP.mcpack

Texture.name: Cave Enhancements Rewritten!
Texture.role: This add-on completely changes the underground! Introducing NEW cave biomes, mobs, and uses expanding upon the 1.17 and 1.18 updates alike.
Texture.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/3/Cave Enhancements Rewritten RP.mcpack

Texture.name: Minecraft Bedrock...A Drow's Life
Texture.role: 'The Drow'... a mysterious dark elf that lives underground (like Dwarves). They are very magical creatures (usually Evil).

Texture.name: X-Ray + Dungeon And Stronghold Finder
Texture.role: This is another X-Ray pack with another perk. I've made an X-Ray pack for the nether, and one for the overworld that keeps gravel visible.
Texture.file_url: https://kossandroid.com//Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/9/X-Ray + Dungeon And Stronghold Finder.mcpack

Texture.name: Night Vision Torch Addon
Texture.role: The Night Vision Torch Addon adds a new function for torches in Minecraft. It basically turns the torch into a light source and it works just by holding it in your hand.

Texture.name: Sea-Through Multi-Tool + X-Ray
Texture.role: Sea-Through seeks to improve and assist you in many elements of your Minecraft experience, including several X-Ray variations, infinite night-vision, and many more features that will aid you in finding ores, caverns, and player bases! Alternatively, utilize the pack's handy features without X-Ray Enabled!

Texture.name: Black Fog Resource Pack
Texture.role: Many people will have a scary impression of it. This resource pack darkens the world.

Texture.name: Redstone Mechanic Addon (B)
Texture.role: Redstone Mechanic is an add-on which replaces 25 vanilla mobs with awesome Redstone mobs! It also adds a whole bunch of new items such as underwater helmets and powerful weapons.

Texture.name: 99% X-Ray
Texture.role: You've seen the X-Ray packs on this website. Yes, they're really good, and have been made really well, but none of them have this extremely useful, feature: Gravel is opaque.

Texture.name: Useful Commands Add-On
Texture.role: Do you want some new 'commands' that can help you in-game ? avoid typing long commands just for a night vision or invisibility effect, kill every Mobs except players easily, troll your friends easily and so on. This Add-On is good for you because it adds some interesting functions !

Texture.name: Bridgeworks Entertainment Pumpkin Blur Pack (Halloween Edition)
Texture.role: Need a Spooky Halloween Pumpkin Blur for a Minecraft Map? Want some Spooky Aesthetics for your Horror Game? Or just want to feel like you're playing a different game? Or watching someone thru a Security Camera? Or Seeing at Night? Then this pack is for you!

Texture.name: Netherrack X-Ray
Texture.role: Have you ever thought about how much easier it would be to be able to Xray for netherite and other ores? Well, you can now with this amazing resource pack, which is completely free to download!

Texture.name: Night Vision Goggles Resource Pack
Texture.role: This is a quite simple texture pack which adds a really cool night vision headset feature to the game.

Texture.name: Clear Water + Night Vision
Texture.role: Did you tired of trying to see things in dark and tire your eyes? Well, this texture pack is for you This pack removes the water fog and makes dark areas brighter.

Texture.name: Norm Boss Battles - Double Content Update (B)
Texture.role: You Must Download the Behavior AND the Resource pack. This pack adds new boss battles, a new items and a new sword (Blade of Buffs). I got comments saying that pack be bad and stuff. Then I got comments saying keep up the good work. So I went and did something that I'm good at - not creating new mobs. Despite getting Blockbench as per suggestion I struggled with 3d models. So, I finally update the pack with double the content. Not what people want but, I'm trying. This was just lying around in my files - I haven't worked on this in forever - apart from fixing the few item textures there probably won't be another Update
Texture.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Bosses/1/Norm Boss Battles behavior V1.1.mcpack

Texture.name: Norm Boss Battles - Double Content Update (R)
Texture.role: You Must Download the Behavior AND the Resource pack. This pack adds new boss battles, a new items and a new sword (Blade of Buffs). I got comments saying that pack be bad and stuff. Then I got comments saying keep up the good work. So I went and did something that I'm good at - not creating new mobs. Despite getting Blockbench as per suggestion I struggled with 3d models. So, I finally update the pack with double the content. Not what people want but, I'm trying. This was just lying around in my files - I haven't worked on this in forever - apart from fixing the few item textures there probably won't be another Update

Texture.name: More Boss Add-on
Texture.role: Have you ever feel Minecraft is too easy? Not enough bosses? Well this add-on got you covered, this add-on add 4 more bosses each needed to be defeated to finish the game.

Texture.name: More Boss Add-on
Texture.role: Have you ever feel Minecraft is too easy? Not enough bosses? Well this add-on got you covered, this add-on add 4 more bosses each needed to be defeated to finish the game.

Texture.name: Elemental Bosses Add-on (B)
Texture.role: This addon brings five amazing bosses to Minecraft PE and each of them have their unique attack ability. One cool feature is that most of them can be spawned by a summoning ritual which consists of killing a specific type of mob. You can of course also use spawn eggs to summon them but the killing ritual definitely adds to the experience!

Texture.name: Elemental Bosses Add-on (R)
Texture.role: This addon brings five amazing bosses to Minecraft PE and each of them have their unique attack ability. One cool feature is that most of them can be spawned by a summoning ritual which consists of killing a specific type of mob. You can of course also use spawn eggs to summon them but the killing ritual definitely adds to the experience!

Texture.name: Mine-NameTagBoss Addon
Texture.role: This is an addon which implements eight different bosses in-game and all of them can be summoned by using name tags. Even though all of the bosses are incredibly dangerous, it's actually quite lucrative to fight them since they drop some amazing loot which you would otherwise have to work several days in Minecraft to obtain.

Texture.name: Mine-NameTagBoss Addon
Texture.role: This is an addon which implements eight different bosses in-game and all of them can be summoned by using name tags. Even though all of the bosses are incredibly dangerous, it's actually quite lucrative to fight them since they drop some amazing loot which you would otherwise have to work several days in Minecraft to obtain.

Texture.name: Entity 303 Boss Addon
Texture.role: Entity 303 is a creepypasta which was (much similar to Herobrine) created just to scare people. Even though there have been hundreds (or maybe even thousands) of sightings of these creatures all of them are most likely fake as there have been no evidence to prove that they actually exist in-game (except through mods or addons like this one). This addon replaces the Wither Boss with the Entity 303 Boss. He is much larger than the Wither Boss and also a bit more dangerous.

Texture.name: Entity 303 Boss Addon
Texture.role: Entity 303 is a creepypasta which was (much similar to Herobrine) created just to scare people. Even though there have been hundreds (or maybe even thousands) of sightings of these creatures all of them are most likely fake as there have been no evidence to prove that they actually exist in-game (except through mods or addons like this one). This addon replaces the Wither Boss with the Entity 303 Boss. He is much larger than the Wither Boss and also a bit more dangerous.

Texture.name: Minecraft Expanded: A Growing Overhaul REVIVAL (B)
Texture.role: I am introducing an addon that I hope will completely change the way many people play Minecraft. My idea is to get more people into playing with their friends. I wanted to do that by adding a series of bosses and interactions that are challenging and require extra thinking.

Texture.name: Minecraft Expanded: A Growing Overhaul REVIVAL (R)
Texture.role: I am introducing an addon that I hope will completely change the way many people play Minecraft. My idea is to get more people into playing with their friends. I wanted to do that by adding a series of bosses and interactions that are challenging and require extra thinking.

Texture.name: Magician Supreme Boss Add-on (B)
Texture.role: This add-on turns the swamp biome into something much more dangerous to explore since sometimes you'll find the Magician Supreme Boss wandering around there. Even though he has a striking resemblance to Santa Claus you will do best to avoid him at any cost since he is very dangerous and will ultimately try to kill you.

Texture.name: Magician Supreme Boss Add-on (R)
Texture.role: This add-on turns the swamp biome into something much more dangerous to explore since sometimes you'll find the Magician Supreme Boss wandering around there. Even though he has a striking resemblance to Santa Claus you will do best to avoid him at any cost since he is very dangerous and will ultimately try to kill you.

Texture.name: Fractured World Addon (B)
Texture.role: This add-on features all of the mobs which were included in the Fractured World adventure map. All new mobs have complete new models and textures which creates a whole new experience in the Overworld (or wherever else you can find them). Most of them are quite powerful, and some even are considered bosses, so this is a great option for anyone who is looking for new challenges in Minecraft.

Texture.name: Fractured World Addon (R)
Texture.role: This add-on features all of the mobs which were included in the Fractured World adventure map. All new mobs have complete new models and textures which creates a whole new experience in the Overworld (or wherever else you can find them). Most of them are quite powerful, and some even are considered bosses, so this is a great option for anyone who is looking for new challenges in Minecraft.

Texture.name: The Ender Boss Addon (B)
Texture.role: The Ender Boss is the lord of all Endermen and they are never late to come and assist their lords when a fight breaks out. It's one of the most dangerous mobs which you can possibly find spawning in the Overworld. It has most abilities which the Endermen have but with the addition of shooting fireballs, more strength and other things to just make it a total nightmare.

Texture.name: The Ender Boss Addon (R)
Texture.role: The Ender Boss is the lord of all Endermen and they are never late to come and assist their lords when a fight breaks out. It's one of the most dangerous mobs which you can possibly find spawning in the Overworld. It has most abilities which the Endermen have but with the addition of shooting fireballs, more strength and other things to just make it a total nightmare.

Texture.name: End King Boss Addon (0.17.0 Only!) (Texture)
Texture.role: The End King is one of the toughest bosses you can fight in Minecraft PE. It has more health than the ender dragon and it got unique attacking abilities which definitely will make you struggle. However, if you do have what it takes to defeat this incredible boss then you will be rewarded by plenty.

Texture.name: End King Boss Addon (0.17.0 Only!) (Add-on)
Texture.role: The End King is one of the toughest bosses you can fight in Minecraft PE. It has more health than the ender dragon and it got unique attacking abilities which definitely will make you struggle. However, if you do have what it takes to defeat this incredible boss then you will be rewarded by plenty.

Texture.name: Arid V1.1.1 (B)
Texture.role: Arid is a biome overhaul addon that adds tons of new content into Desert biomes. You should hopefully find deserts more enjoyable and rewarding to explore. In Arid you will find new ores, dungeons, mobs, bosses, cool weapons, and lots of other content.

Texture.name: Arid V1.1.1 (R)
Texture.role: Arid is a biome overhaul addon that adds tons of new content into Desert biomes. You should hopefully find deserts more enjoyable and rewarding to explore. In Arid you will find new ores, dungeons, mobs, bosses, cool weapons, and lots of other content.

Texture.name: Jimbo's Aether Add-on
Texture.role: This add-on replaces the End with a new and exciting dimension known as the Aether. Here you will find Aethermen and the Aether Dragon who actually look like divine and sacred creatures, but don't be fooled.

Texture.name: Shinobi Chronicles
Texture.role: Have you ever wanted to be a shinobi and use ninja tools? Then this addon is for you! Shinobi chronicles includes items and entities from naruto shippuden.
Texture.file_url: https://kossandroid.com/Data Android/Minecraft/Night Vision/39/Shinobi Chronicles Resource Pack V1.01.mcpack
